TunableList.name: EXCLUSIVITY_RULES
TunableList.description: A list of exclusivity rules. Each exclusivity rule is a pair of Story Progression Exclusivity Categories. Categories are bi directional so you do not need to tune both directions of categories. Any rules that are tuned make it so that when seeding a new arc we will not seed the arc on Sims that have an incompatible category on them or on the household. With households we will check the exclusivity against all of the arcs on Sims within the household. If an exclusivity pair is not tuned here that means that they are compatible. The Neutral category is always compatible with everything. Example: If you want two groups of arcs to be incompatible with each other, tune each exclusivity category. category 1: DEATH category 2: CAREER This will make it so that if a death arc is on a Sim then a career arc will not be added and vice versa if a career arc is on a Sim then a death arc will not be added. If you want to create a mutually incompatible grouping of arcs, tune the same exclusivity category twice. category 1: CAREER category 2: CAREER This will make it so that multiple different career arcs cannot be placed on the same Sim. This can be used to prevent adding a career and retiring/quitting a career to be tuned at the same time.
